div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 348 Delos, 1907 (311) Burial: c. 85-80 B.C. (T) Contents: 12 AR. From excavations Athens: 5 New Style tetradr. (incl. Sullan) 5 New Style dr. (incl. Sullan) Ephesus: 1 cist. (89 B.C.) Tralles: 1 cist. Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1911, 1, p. 77 † Thompson, Athens (Delos Λ-2), pp. 520-1 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 284 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516
